2025-01-10.significance: Fulfillment of desires and wishes. A day for spiritual cleansing.
2025-01-10.meaning: This Ekadashi removes obstacles and grants success in endeavors.

2025-01-15.significance: Sun enters Capricorn. Harvest festival marking end of winter.
2025-01-15.meaning: Celebrate new beginnings and thank nature for the harvest.

2025-01-25.significance: Blessing of children and family prosperity.
2025-01-25.meaning: Devotion to Lord Vishnu for family well-being and progeny.

2025-02-02.significance: Worship Goddess Saraswati. Spring arrives, celebrate knowledge and learning.
2025-02-02.meaning: Honor education, arts, music. Great day to start learning something new!

2025-02-08.significance: Use of sesame seeds for charity and blessings.
2025-02-08.meaning: Donate sesame seeds, oil, and food for spiritual merit.

2025-02-23.significance: Victory in all endeavors. Brings success and removes sins.
2025-02-23.meaning: Fast for triumph over obstacles and negative karma.

2025-02-26.significance: The great night of Lord Shiva. Marriage of Shiva and Parvati.
2025-02-26.meaning: Stay awake all night, meditate, and worship Shiva for spiritual awakening.

2025-03-10.significance: Conquering obstacles and enemies. Victory in all pursuits.
2025-03-10.meaning: Fast for overcoming challenges and achieving success.

2025-03-14.significance: Festival of colors! Victory of devotion over evil. Spring celebration.
2025-03-14.meaning: Celebrate love, friendship, and the triumph of good. Play with colors!

2025-03-25.significance: Worship of Amla (gooseberry) tree. Health and longevity.
2025-03-25.meaning: Honor nature and seek blessings for good health.

2025-03-30.significance: Hindu New Year! Celebrate new beginnings and prosperity.
2025-03-30.meaning: Start fresh, set goals, welcome abundance. Hoist the Gudi flag!

2025-04-06.significance: Birth of Lord Rama. Symbol of dharma and righteousness.
2025-04-06.meaning: Celebrate the ideal king who stood for truth and duty.

2025-04-08.significance: Removal of sins and past karma. Mental clarity and forgiveness.
2025-04-08.meaning: Fast for purification of mind and soul. Let go of guilt.

2025-04-12.significance: Birth of Lord Hanuman. Strength, devotion, and courage.
2025-04-12.meaning: Honor the ultimate devotee. Seek strength to overcome challenges.

2025-04-23.significance: Fulfillment of desires and wishes. Removes obstacles.
2025-04-23.meaning: Fast with pure intentions for legitimate desires.

2025-05-08.significance: Protection from evil and negativity. Shield of faith.
2025-05-08.meaning: Fast for divine protection and spiritual strength.

2025-05-22.significance: Liberation from illusions. See truth clearly.
2025-05-22.meaning: Fast to break free from maya (illusion) and false attachments.

2025-05-30.significance: Most auspicious day! Perfect for new beginnings, buying gold.
2025-05-30.meaning: Everything started today brings eternal prosperity. No muhurat needed!
